ghostPost.title: The Ten Commandments of Good Marketing
ghostPost.excerpt:
These are the unbreakables.  The codes we hold so dearly that any variation from
them means we are not doing our job to the best of our abilities, which is
unacceptable.  In the coming days, we will expound upon each one of these rules,
for your marketing pleasure.
